title: Angina
content:
Even small changes can have a positive impact on your risk of heart attack and stroke. The more you change, the better for your health. 
Learn more about: 
  * [Stopping smoking](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/s/smoking-topics)
  * [Exercise and physical activity](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/p/physical-activity)
  * [Healthy and unhealthy fats](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/f/fats-oils)
  * [Cutting back on salt](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/s/sodium-salt)
  * [Benefits of drinking less alcohol](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/a/alcohol-the-benefits-of-drinking-less)
  * [Reaching a healthy weight](https://healthify.nz/hauora-wellbeing/w/weight-loss)
  * [Managing stress](https://healthify.nz/health-a-z/s/stress)


####   
Apps reviewed by Healthify
You may find it useful to look at some [quit smoking apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/q/quit-smoking-apps), [nutrition, exercise and weight management apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/n/nutrition-exercise-and-weight-management-apps), [blood pressure apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/b/blood-pressure-apps), [diabetes apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/d/diabetes-apps) and [meditation and mindfulness apps](https://healthify.nz/apps/m/meditation-and-mindfulness-apps).
####  What is the outlook if I have angina? 
Stable angina usually improves with medicines and healthy lifestyle changes.
